articles.author: Chris Velazco
articles.title: Apple Watch Series 8: A potent health tool, but not hugely different - The Washington Post
articles.description: Apple has crammed even more sensors into its new Watch 8 series, all in the hopes of offering a more complete picture of your health. Are they worth it?
articles.content:
